Pass on this game. Good concept but really poor execution. Players disconnect constantly, which instantly imbalances/ruins the game. Poor servers cause horrendous wait times and certain perks become lagy, unusable, and frustrating. Every update seems to make the gameplay worse and worse. Player hit boxes are ridiculously bad. Fun 3/10. Frustration 11/10.

ApÃ³s 1 mÃªs de jogo resolvi refazer minha anÃ¡lise sobre o jogo, e ao invÃ©s de mudar de opiniÃ£o, tudo que ocorreu foi o agravar do que eu ja pensava. Vou listar problemas encontrados no jogo:
- Mal otimizado
- Matchmaking mal feito (um dos piores que jÃ¡ vi)
- Crashs frequentes, forÃ§ando o jogador a tentar jogar as vezes por 3 vezes seguidas atÃ© parar de crashar, constantemente o jogo "para de responder" e isso Ã© sempre ao decorrer da partida, muita das vezes no inicio delas.
- Jogadores extremamente tÃ³xicos
- Bugs incontÃ¡veis
- Lag na partida
- Demora para achar partidas, as vezes vocÃª terÃ¡ de esperar 5 minutos ou mais para achar uma partida, isso se nÃ£o ocorrer algum erro listado acima e vocÃª ter que tentar tudo do 0.
- Jogo mercenÃ¡rio, vocÃª compra 10% do jogo, o resto sÃ³ com DLC. 
- Killers que irÃ£o camperar o gancho, nÃ£o deixando vocÃª ser resgatado atÃ© que morra no gancho, nÃ£o dando nenhuma opÃ§Ã£o de saÃ­da, consequentemente, diversÃ£o.
- Sistema de ranks Ã© horrÃ­vel, vocÃª comeÃ§a no rank 20 e pode ir atÃ© o rank 1 (mÃ¡ximo), para passar de um rank para o outro sÃ£o necessÃ¡rios os "pips" que vocÃª ganha alcanÃ§ando objetivos na partida, o que Ã© extremamente bugado, uma vez que em algumas partidas vocÃª faz 2-3 geradores, resgate sobreviventes do gancho e ainda assim perde pip e cai de rank, e um colega que esteja jogando junto mesmo fazendo menos objetivos e participaÃ§Ãµes ganha. 

Resumindo: Ã‰ um jogo que tem tudo para dar certo mas nÃ£o recebe investimento apropriado, Ã© repleto de bugs, jogadores tÃ³xicos te xingando de tudo que Ã© possÃ­vel em espanhol e vocÃª se aborrece mais do que se diverte. Arrependido da compra.

Dead By Daylight est un jeu vraiment prenant , un jeu sympa surtout entre amis en tant que survivant que seul en tueur quand le besoin de se dÃ©fouler se fait entendre ... si je devais parler du positif et nÃ©gatif je dirais ceci.

-positif : 
.Nous avons la possibilitÃ© de jouer les nouveaux DLC en avance grace au PTB (serveur test) gratuitement .
.Nous pouvons acheter des tueur/survivant sans forcÃ©ment besoin de payer pour de vrai (Ã  voir dans le jeu).
.Nous pouvons personnaliser nos personnages favoris avec des "skins"
.il ne coÃ»te pas cher ce qui est un trÃ¨s bon point (20 euros).
.AtmosphÃ¨re Creepy et screamer au rendez vous.
.Comme le dit la description vous ne tomberez jamais sur la mÃªme partie que ce soit carte / coffre / totem / gÃ©nÃ©rateur.
.En tant que survivant vous pouvez jouer en team en invitant vos amis via steam ou sur le jeu directement .
.Des tutos sont prÃ©sents pour vous familiariser (mÃªme si beaucoup de gens les nÃ©gligents..).
.Le jeu possÃ¨de beaux graphismes agrÃ©able Ã  regarder (quand on ne se fait pas poursuivre ^^).
.Outils variÃ©s des deux cÃ´tÃ©s .
.Un crossplateforme est activÃ© nous pouvons donc croiser des joueurs PS4/XBOX one dans nos games. 

Passons maintenant aux nÃ©gatifs car comme dans tous jeux il y a des mauvais points.

-nÃ©gatif :
.Le temps de recherche pour trouver une partie est assez longue selon l'heure Ã  laquelle on joue (10Min environs MAX).
.La communautÃ© trÃ¨s toxique en partie comme en chat (malheureusement les pires sont : FranÃ§ais ou Russes).
.Le Jeu ne fait rien pour Ã©viter le cancer dans les games (Camping/tunnel/slugh/camp hatch).
.Il y a Beaucoup de joueurs jouent cancer et restes impunis..
.La hit box (distance Ã  laquelle le tueur peut vous frapper) est mal codÃ©e car elle traverse les fenÃªtres et certaines pallettes.
.Les bugs sont assez courants (compÃ©tences non activÃ©es EX : Atterissage Ã©quilibrÃ© / drÃ´lement ne s'activant pas).
.Le CÃ´tÃ© "gore" Ã  revoir car souvent rÃ©pÃ©titif pour un jeu d'horreur.
.Le support ne vous aide pas vraiment quand vous avez un problÃ¨me..
.Les teams adverses sont trop cancer en utilisant les bugs mais si le tueur fait de mÃªme il se fait insulter.

En conclusion , si je devrais Ãªtre pour ou contre je m'en remet Ã  vous le conseillais tout de mÃªme car j'aime Ã©normÃ©ment ce jeu qui est quand mÃªme attractif [Surtout avec vos amis] peu cher / souvent en promotion . il est marrant tout en Ã©tant flippant (quelques souris on voler de mon bureau pour un screamer ^^'). Enfin il est toujours en constant dÃ©veloppement ce qui est excitant de savoir que du nouveau contenu arrive au fur et a mesure que ce soit DLC/Musique/style de Jeu/carte les mises Ã  jour de ce jeu nous donnes envies d'y jouer une fois la Mise Ã  jour terminÃ©e !

Mais s'il vous plait calmer cette connerie de communautÃ© y'en a marre..

Okay, so after around 75 hours I've changed my mind about this game. It's good IN THEORY but it's incredibly flawed past that. Firstly, the emblems system is complete dogshit. The devs expect you to do everything in order to pip or double pip. I once almost got max bloodpoints in a single round (32,000) and I STILL only got 1 pip. And don't even get me started about the campers and tunnelers. They ruin the experience. The devs say it's fine because the other people in the match get generators done but half the time you can facecamp and kill 2 people, let the rest go, and still pip. And then there's the hitboxes...You can get hit from 2 feet away, at 90 PING. Okay then. This game could be so good but the devs are just...terrible.

It is just hard to get back into this game from how sometimes I will attempt to play and join a lobby as a killer in about 1 min, then try other times and have to wait up to 30 mins just to find a lobby... The state of the game is at an average level, and definitely needs to have better servers.

4.5.0 is the rock bottom point for the game. The devs decided to implement a new HUD and new animations despite overwhelmingly negative feedback from their player base. The devs do not listen to player feedback and have their own agendas. The health of the game is piss poor, each patch introducing new bugs on top of the ones that have been around for years. BHVR is only interested in cheap ways to make money and not the overall state of the game. It is unsustainable. I strongly urge you to find another game to play. After so much time wasted in this game I think it is time to move on.

Ğ°Ñ‹
Game's fun.

Game starts out fun when you're first learning. Once you get up into higher ranks you start to realize the main flaw. The game does not come with voice chat.   It was designed that way but unfortunately entire teams of players exploit that by using discord to cheat.  This creates a severe imbalance against killers. Watch some "SWF"videos on youtube and you can hear players talking to each other strategising against the killer. This isn't how the game was designed to be played.  Developers have done nothing to address this.  The player base can be pretty toxic.   Read some of the discussions on Reddit and other forums before you spend money on this. They need to focus on how to build a better player base to make this more enjoyable.  The good: the game is pretty addictive and you will come across some people who are fun to play with.  The music, artwork and jumpscares are where this game shines.  If you're a horror fan you should give it a shot.

When i first knew of this game because of the stranger things dlc, my friends persuaded me to buy the game, at first i did not knew what to do, until i've learnt the mechanics the hard way.
The hit box in this game is so damn inconsistent, and wonky at times. I got hit by the huntress when i was not even close to 3m away, and at times i can get away with a hit that seemingly hit me.
Graphics wise - very spec friendly, learning curve tends to be challenged against new players
